title: 2010 mbp 15" crashes with photshop
message: ASD EFI and OS pass without a problem, under heavy graphic stress test it works flawlessly, GMUX switching works fine, OS can switch the graphic without a crash but as soon as you open the photoshop the OS crashes instantly and the mac restarts, any ideas?

title: 2010 mbp 15" crashes with photshop
message: Should know by now that this is C9560 issue.
